original_text: (for as that righteous man lived among them day after day, he was tormenting his righteous soul over their lawless deeds that he saw and heard);
korean_text: (이는 이 의인이 그들 중에 거하여 날마다 저 불법한 행실을 보고 들음으로 그 의로운 심령이 상함이라)

sentences.original_text: for as that righteous man lived among them
he was tormenting his righteous soul
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그의 의로운 영혼을 괴롭게 하였으니
